DNS (Seeds).description: Use of DNS seeds for finding Lightning Network nodes.

Payment Routing.description: Ability to route payments through the Lightning Network.

MPP.description: Multi-Path Payments: splitting payments across multiple Lightning channels.

Manage Own Channels.description: Ability for users to create and manage their own Lightning channels.

Low Incoming Liquidity.description: Ways to address incoming liquidity challenges for receiving payments.

KYC.description: Know Your Customer requirements for using the wallet.

Bolt11 Support.description: Support for the BOLT11 Lightning Network invoice format.
